articles.title: Bond market's tilt remains bearish even after post-Fed shakeout - Economic Times
articles.description: The Feds hawkish shift this month dealt a blow to wagers on a selloff in Treasuries and a steeper yield curve by briefly tamping down inflation concerns. The benchmark 10-year rate is around 25 basis points below the 14-month peak touched at the end of March.
